column4: Hey does anyone know of a Application for Ubuntu that will display a icon that can blink on my desktop to show when my hard drive is reading/writing? I can't seem to hook up my hard drive light on my tower
my computer slows down at times, i'm trying to figure out if its my hard drive(s) lagging behind or not...
check out the krell suite: search your package manager (synaptic, or something like it) for "krell"
also you can add a system monitor utility to your gnome panel (if you use gnome)
